title: Madrese International Short Film Festival wraps up in Tehran
description: TEHRAN- The 9th edition of the Madrese International Short Film Festival (MISFF) concluded on Saturday with a ceremony at Tehran’s Art Bureau, where the winners of the different sections of the event were honored.

title: Adaptation of Philippe Claudel’s “Compromise” to go on stage in Tehran
description: TEHRAN-an adaptation of French writer Phillip Claudel’s play “Compromise” will go on stage at Tehran's Malek Theater Hall on April 4.

title: Farsi Cinema Awards celebrate films, focuses on language preservation
description: TEHRAN- The 5th edition of Farsi Cinema Awards ceremony took place at Tehran's Art Bureau on Saturday, honoring four Iranian films without a winner.

title: Regional security gains from Iran-Armenia connections: FM
description: TEHRAN- Iran’s foreign minister has advocated for deeper ties with Armenia, stating that more collaboration between the two countries would be advantageous for the security, stability, and peace of the region.

title: Iran nabs largest UK-linked financial sabotage, online gambling network
description: TEHRAN- The largest nationwide coordinated internet gambling and betting network, founded and run by UK-based entities, was brought down by Iran’s Intelligence Ministry.

title: The double standards of the West in dealing with Iran and Israel
description: TEHRAN - Siasat-e-Rooz dedicated its editorial to the dual behavior of the West and its supporters on the issue of Iran and Israel and said: Western and Persian-language media focused all their programs on Women's Day on the women of Iran and Afghanistan, as if Western women were in heaven, and the women of Iran and Afghanistan have critical and exceptional conditions.

title: Stability along Iran’s borders ensured with all might: Commander
description: TEHRAN – In a recent statement, the Commander of Iran’s Army Ground Force Brigadier General Kioumars Heidari, underscored the extensive deployment of forces across all national borders.

title: Iran’s naval prowess paves the way for global dominance: MP
description: TEHRAN - In a recent announcement, the head of the National Security and Foreign Policy Committee of the Iranian Parliament underscored the profound global ramifications of achieving maritime dominance for the country.

title: Iran's reality vs. CENTCOM's rhetoric
description: TEHRAN- CENTCOM's narrative paints Tehran as an outsider in the region, disengaged from neighborly cooperation. Nevertheless, Iran's recent flurry of regional and international maneuvers starkly contradicts CENTCOM's unsubstantiated claims.

title: Raisi sends congratulatory message to new Pakistan president
description: TEHRAN- Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi has sent a congratulatory message to Asif Ali Zardari on his election as the new President of Pakistan and expressed hope that relations between the two countries, which have historical, cultural and religious history, will be further developed and deepened during his presidency.

title: Iran proposes six practical proposals for Gaza
description: TEHRAN- Iranian Foreign Minister Hossein Amir Abdollahian has proposed six practical proposals for resolving issues in the Gaza Strip during an emergency meeting of the Organization of Islamic Cooperation (OIC) in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia on Tuesday.

title: Biden struggles to shake off “Dictator, Genocide Joe” epithet
description: TEHRAN- As Israel presses ahead with its brutal onslaught on the Gaza Strip more Palestinians are losing their lives not only in the regime’s strikes but also due to hunger.

title: Biden stands to lose election for backing Gaza genocide
description: TEHRAN- U.S. President Joe Biden has spent the best part of his long career in politics, offering unwavering support for the Israeli occupation of Palestinian lands.

title: Hezbollah targets Israeli positions with several rockets, drones
description: The Hezbollah resistance movement launched rocket and drone attacks on positions in the Israeli-occupied territories in retaliation for a deadly attack by the regime’s military on southern Lebanon early on Sunday.

title: Israeli military:  249 soldiers killed in Gaza ground offensive
description: The Israeli military announced the death of a soldier killed during fighting in the southern Gaza Strip on Sunday, bringing the toll of slain troops in the ground offensive against the besieged Palestinian teritory to 249.

title: Gaza municipality: Israel destroyed 1mn square meters of roads in Gaza
description: Asem al-Nabeh, a member of the Gaza municipality’s emergency committee, said Israel has destroyed one million square meters of roads in Gaza City.

title: Israel deploys additional forces around Al-Aqsa Mosque
description: Israeli police deployed additional forces Sunday around the flashpoint Al-Aqsa Mosque complex in occupied East Jerusalem, according to Turkey’s Anadolu news agency.

title: Palestine condemns intl. community’s inability to protect civilians
description: The Palestinian Foreign Ministry has described the international failure to protect Palestinians during Ramadan as “an assassination of humanity”.

title: Lufthansa cabin crew call new two-day strike in Germany
description: Lufthansa's cabin crew union has called for a fresh two-day strike across two of Germany's busiest airports, Frankfurt and Munich.

title: Pope Francis criticized for ‘white flag’ comment
description: Ukrainian and allied officials have criticized Pope Francis for saying that Kyiv should have the “courage” to negotiate an end to the war with Russia, a statement many interpreted as a call on Ukraine to surrender.

title: Last week of year with Alireza Qorbani’s concerts in Tehran
description: TEHRAN-The Iranian traditional vocalist Alireza Qorbani will hold his last concerts in the current Iranian year from March 13 to March 19 in Tehran.

title: Treasured collection of TMoCA on show for 2 months
description: TEHRAN-Tehran Museum of Contemporary Art (TMoCA) has put on show a selection of artworks from its treasured collection to the public.

title: “Devil in a Blue Dress” comes to bookstores
description: TEHRAN-The Persian translation of the 1990 hardboiled mystery novel “Devil in a Blue Dress” written by American author Walter Mosley has been released in the bookstores across Iran.

title: CEO urges strategic partnership to boost tourism on Kish Island
description: TEHRAN – On Sunday, the CEO of Kish Free Zone Organization highlighted the crucial role of the governmental and private sectors collaboration with an eye toward boosting tourism on the massive coral island, which is situated in the Persian Gulf.

title: UNESCO-listed Burnt City getting prepared for Nowruz visitors
description: TEHRAN - As the Iranian New Year, Nowruz, approaches, the UNESCO-designated Burnt City is preparing to host enthusiasts of history and art during the festive season.

title: Agritourism in Mazandaran: fusing medicinal plant production with sustainable income
description: TEHRAN - Mazandaran, a picturesque province nestled along the southern coast of the Caspian Sea, has long been celebrated for its fertile lands and favorable climate.

title: A diamond in the rough: Iran’s film tourism needs heed
description: TEHRAN – If you could step into the world of your favorite film or television series, would you? Most of us would jump at the chance, and many do.

title: Chalus-based team win Iran’s sitting volleyball league
description: TEHRAN – Chalus-based team Mehr Molana won the title of the 2024 Iran’s Sitting Volleyball League on Sunday.

title: Over 1,000 schools constructed in deprived areas
description: TEHRAN – More than 1,000 schools have been constructed in underprivileged areas in the east and northeast of the country in the current Iranian calendar year that started in March 2023, an official with the Headquarters for Executing the Order of the Imam Khomeini has said.

title: TEDPIX falls nearly 3,500 points on Sunday
description: TEHRAN- TEDPIX, the main index of the Tehran Stock Exchange (TSE), fell 3,495 points to 2,160,256 on Sunday, which is the second day of the Iranian calendar week.

title: Can technical solutions of Japan-funded FAO project restore Lake Urmia?
description: TEHRAN – The Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO), with the support of the government of Japan, identified technical agricultural solutions to increase water efficiency in the agriculture sector at the Lake Urmia basin, which may be efficient in saving the internationally known biosphere reserves.

title: Afghanistan seeking trade boost through Iranian ports
description: TEHRAN - Afghanistan is seeking to expand trade with various states through the Iranian ports of Chabahar and Bandar Abbas, an Afghanistan official says.

title: Iran to attend Commission on Status of Women
description: TEHRAN – A delegation headed by the vice president for women and family affairs will participate in the 68th Commission on the Status of Women (CSW) which will take place in New York from March 11-22.

title: BRICS sets up anti-money laundering working group
description: TEHRAN - An Iranian official with the Iranian Economy Ministry has confirmed that the BRICS group of emerging economies set up an anti-money laundering council nearly three months ago.

title: Female Iranian scientist grabs APS award 2024
description: TEHRAN – Azadeh Keivani has won the American Physics Society’s (APS) award for the development and application of artificial intelligence techniques to problems ranging from education to clinical studies in cancer and heart disease.

title: Iranian Tractor Company exports products to 24 countries
description: TEHRAN - The deputy head of Iran Tractor Manufacturing Company (ITMCO) has said the company is exporting its products to 24 countries on different continents.

title: Tehran to host 2nd Iran-Africa trade summit in April
description: TEHRAN - Iran will host economy ministers from more than 40 African countries at the second Iran-Africa International Summit set to be held in April, an official at Iran’s Trade Promotion Organization (TPO) announced.

title: Annual trade between Iran, Russia’s Astrakhan up 15%
description: TEHRAN - The minister of external relations of Russia’s Astrakhan region has said that trade exchanges between the southern region and Iran grew by 15 percent in 2023.

title: POGC inks $20b deal with domestic firms to boost SP recovery factor
description: TEHRAN – Iran’s Pars Oil and Gas Company (POGC), which is in charge of developing the country’s giant South Pars gas field in the Persian Gulf, has signed a deal worth $20 billion with domestic contractors to improve the pressure at the field’s wells and increase its recovery factor.

title: Tehran, Baghdad keen to expand monetary, banking ties: official
description: TEHRAN - The chairman of the Iran-Iraq Joint Chamber of Commerce has said banking officials from the two countries are keen to expand the monetary and banking relations, Tasnim News Agency reported.

title: Israel hits landmark residential tower in Rafah as Gaza truce talks stall
description:
Israel hits one of the largest residential towers in Rafah with air raid, displacing hundreds who fled the building.

Israeli forces have struck one of the largest residential towers in Rafah in the southern Gaza Strip, residents said, stepping up pressure on the last area of the enclave it has not yet invaded and where more than a million displaced Palestinians are sheltering.

title: Beiranvand's performance raises concerns over future
description: TEHRAN - Alireza Beiranvand, Iran's national team and Persepolis Mo. 1 goalkeeper, has recently shown poor performance and is under pressure at the moment.
